message: It would be good for the rerun schedule to be posted to the Google calender so that you can see what is coming up next
Ah yeah, that would be neat
Problem is they have sometimes run reruns at fly, so a schedule has to be little bending

@AussiMike I agree there should be a rerun schedule but using the google calendar helps narrow it down as they seem to mostly keep the most recent shows in the loop. I must be using an old google calendar..mine has been quite wrong lately. Where's a link to a current twit.tv sched?
I'd also like the reruns to contain more of the pre- and post show ... that's the aspect that makes it even more fun. the more open studio mic's the better :-)
That's called 'Programming'...I would really like to see shows on BTS.  That's cool.
BTW. if you've got an iPad, you should get the official TWiT app. It has a schedule, sort of, and you can also download and watch previous episodes.
Ooh, and one suggestion, please vary the reruns per day in my morning (between 11:00pm and 01:00 am San Fransico time). It's rough waking up to Windows weekly three times a week ;-)
I have the TWIT app an my Iphone and its good to keep up with programs.
I think they need a second channel of just reruns. Let Ford kick in some cash, they have been slacking recently.
